channel.title: Our Best Recipes
channel.description: Recent content on Our Best Recipes

item.title: Setting Up Docker Dev Environment
item.description: This is a walkthrough to setup a new Python dev environment with Docker Requirements: Docker Desktop installed https://docs.docker.com/docker-for-mac/install/ Getting started Let's create a new project mkdir docker-flask cd docker-flask Create a directory for the flask app mkdir flask_app touch __init__.py Create a docker and docker-compose file for the flask project touch flask_app/Dockerfile touch docker-compose.yml Let's create a started flask project touch app.py touch requirements.txt Open the app.

item.title: Sunday Crepes Recipe
item.description: Ingredients - 15 larges crepes 4 eggs 500 ml of milk 1.5 cups of gluten free flour 2 table spoon of coconut oil Preparation - 10 minutes In a large mixing bowl, create a well with flour then add eggs, slowly whisking them into flour. Gradually add the milk, whisking to combine. Let batter stand at room temperature until bubbly on top, 40 minutes to 1 hour.
